Comments_List: I learn a lot about biological membrane, including lipid, membrane proteins and so on.

I obtained a deeper understanding of membranes and how they interact with each other and other molecules such as proteins. We learned how the membrane composition altered local environments and how this in turn alters the functionality of different processes.
physical properties of membranes and how they interact with other molecules
This course is really really really great! But I think sometimes the questions in the weekly assignment are not very clear. I do not really know what the questions want to ask.

In this course we were tasked to think critically about problems that did not have immediately obvious answers which I consider a strength for the course. The content was taught in a manner that built on itself, but that allowed the freedom to explore topics of interest to the students.
hope it can be expanded into a full credit course in the future.
Yes. This lecture is very useful, especially when you need to do something about biological membrane.
I would recommend this course to any student as understanding biological membranes allows for a clearer picture to be obtained at the cellular level.
yes, very useful for those embarking on projects involving liposomes and vesicles.
